name: python_airbnb_clone
description: Devide and Conquer !!!     Organize Apps Before to start coding with Django.     Rules for Making Apps :     ✔  'I need to' <APP FEATURE> <APP NAME>     ex) I need to create the user         I need to delete the user     ❌ <APP that already exits> can do <APP FEATURE>.     ex) <User App> can do 'send message'         -> <Message App> can send a message     ex) <Room App> can do 'create user'         -> <User App> can create a user
